kyc.title: احراز هویت KYC
kyc.description: احراز هویت خود را تکمیل کنید تا به تمام ویژگی‌های معاملاتی دسترسی داشته باشید. تمام اطلاعات به صورت امن ذخیره و رمزگذاری می‌شوند.
kyc.fullNamePlaceholder: همانطور که در سند شناسایی شما نشان داده شده است
kyc.note: تمام فیلدهای علامت‌دار با * الزامی هستند. اطلاعات شما توسط تیم امنیتی ما تأیید می‌شود. این فرآیند معمولاً ۱-۳ روز کاری طول می‌کشد.

landing.heroSubtitle: [FA] Earn money on cryptocurrency price differences across exchanges using artificial intelligence algorithms. Start arbitrage trading in 2 minutes and watch your investments grow - earn 40-120% daily
landing.loginAlreadyExists: [FA] This login is already in use
landing.tradeCryptoDescription: [FA] Earn money on cryptocurrency price differences across multiple exchanges using artificial intelligence arbitrage algorithms.
landing.aiSystemProcesses: [FA] AI system processes market data and selects optimal strategies
landing.eachBotSpecializes: [FA] Each bot specializes in finding price differences across exchanges
landing.joinThousands: [FA] Join thousands of successful arbitrage traders
landing.blockMindDescription: [FA] BlockMind is an AI-powered arbitrage platform that uses machine learning algorithms to find price differences across cryptocurrency exchanges and execute profitable arbitrage trades automatically.
landing.blockMindConnects: [FA] BlockMind connects to major cryptocurrency exchanges through secure APIs and uses a network of specialized arbitrage bots to monitor price differences 24/7.
landing.step1Desc: [FA] Register and complete quick onboarding to access the platform.
landing.step2Desc: [FA] Securely connect your API keys from supported exchanges.
landing.step3Desc: [FA] Pick preferred trading time and risk level for bots.
landing.step4Desc: [FA] Launch the arbitrage bots and monitor profitable price differences in real time.
landing.step5Desc: [FA] Analyze profits and adjust parameters at any time.
landing.disclaimer: [FA] Trading involves risk. Never invest more than you can afford to lose.
landing.feature1Desc: [FA] Machine learning models analyze price differences across exchanges and execute profitable arbitrage trades.
landing.feature2Desc: [FA] 2FA, encryption, and strict access policies keep your account safe.
landing.feature3Desc: [FA] Live charts, bot performance and actionable insights 24/7.
landing.feature4Desc: [FA] A clean, intuitive interface designed for speed and clarity.
landing.feature5Desc: [FA] Our team is always available to help with any questions.
landing.feature6Desc: [FA] Advanced AI algorithms monitor and control risk levels in real-time, protecting your investments while maximizing profit opportunities.
landing.analystBotsScan: [FA] Analyst bots continuously scan multiple exchanges for price differences
landing.signalBotsTrack: [FA] Signal bots track price gaps and arbitrage opportunities across exchanges
landing.coreAIBots: [FA] Core AI bots analyze data and execute arbitrage trades instantly
landing.allOrdersExecuted: [FA] All arbitrage orders are executed automatically across multiple exchanges through APIs
landing.exampleDescription: [FA] If our AI detects that Bitcoin is priced at $45,000 on Exchange A and $45,500 on Exchange B, it instantly buys on Exchange A and sells on Exchange B, securing a $500 profit (minus fees). The system automatically finds and executes such opportunities across multiple exchanges 24/7.
landing.exampleOnly: [FA] This is a simplified example for illustration purposes only.
landing.handsOffAutomation: [FA] Hands-off automation - no arbitrage experience required
landing.riskAwareLogic: [FA] Low-risk arbitrage with instant execution across exchanges
landing.noSoftwareFee: [FA] Profit from price differences across 50+ exchanges simultaneously
landing.selectTradingTime: [FA] Connect your exchange accounts and select arbitrage parameters
landing.startTheBot: [FA] Start the arbitrage bots and watch them find profitable price differences automatically
landing.tradingInvolvesRisk: [FA] Cryptocurrency arbitrage involves risk including exchange failures, withdrawal delays, and fee calculations. While generally lower risk than traditional trading, profits are not guaranteed.
landing.byAccessing: [FA] By accessing or using BlockMind's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
landing.blockMindProvides: [FA] BlockMind provides an automated arbitrage platform that uses artificial intelligence to find and exploit price differences across supported cryptocurrency exchanges.
landing.maintainingAccountSecurity: [FA] Maintaining the security of your account
landing.complyingWithLaws: [FA] Complying with applicable laws and regulations

landing.allPlatformTechnology: [FA] All platform technology, algorithms, and intellectual property belong to BlockMind.
landing.weReserveRight: [FA] We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at our discretion.
landing.blockMindShallNot: [FA] BlockMind shall not be liable for any trading losses or damages.
landing.theseTerms: [FA] These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Moldova.
landing.weUseCookies: [FA] We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience.
landing.dataMayBe: [FA] Data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence.

landing.tradingCryptocurrencies: [FA] Trading cryptocurrencies involves substantial risk of loss.
landing.cryptocurrencyPrices: [FA] Cryptocurrency prices are highly volatile and can fluctuate widely:

landing.historicalPerformance: [FA] Historical performance doesn't guarantee future results
landing.youUnderstand: [FA] You understand these risks and accept full responsibility for your trading decisions
landing.youShouldOnly: [FA] You should only trade with money you can afford to lose

landing.testimonialsSubtitle: [FA] Join thousands of satisfied traders who trust BlockMind
landing.testimonial1: [FA] BlockMind has completely transformed my arbitrage strategy. The AI bots scan 15+ exchanges 24/7 and I've seen consistent profits from price differences. Highly recommend!
landing.testimonial2: [FA] As someone new to crypto arbitrage, BlockMind made everything so simple. The automated system finds price gaps across exchanges while I focus on my day job. Amazing results!
landing.testimonial3: [FA] I've tried many arbitrage platforms, but BlockMind's AI technology is on another level. Finding price differences across exchanges automatically is incredible!
landing.testimonial4: [FA] Started with a small investment and was skeptical at first, but the arbitrage profits speak for themselves. The support team is also incredibly helpful!
landing.testimonial5: [FA] Making 50-80% daily from price differences is unbelievable! BlockMind's multi-exchange scanning is absolutely revolutionary.
landing.testimonial6: [FA] I love how the bots instantly execute trades across exchanges. The speed and accuracy are mind-blowing. Best arbitrage platform ever!
landing.testimonial7: [FA] Been using BlockMind for 6 months. The consistent arbitrage profits from exchange price gaps have exceeded all my expectations.
landing.testimonial8: [FA] The platform monitors so many exchanges simultaneously. I'm earning passive income from price differences I'd never spot manually.
landing.testimonial9: [FA] As a professional trader, I'm impressed by the arbitrage execution speed. Millisecond timing across multiple exchanges is game-changing.
landing.testimonial10: [FA] Simple setup, powerful results. My portfolio grows daily from price differences the AI finds across exchanges automatically.
landing.testimonial11: [FA] The multi-exchange arbitrage strategy is brilliant. I'm making money while sleeping thanks to 24/7 price scanning!
landing.testimonial12: [FA] Customer support is excellent and the arbitrage bot configuration is super intuitive. Five stars all around!
landing.testimonial13: [FA] I've quadrupled my initial investment in just 3 months through cross-exchange arbitrage. BlockMind delivers real results!
landing.testimonial14: [FA] The real-time dashboard showing arbitrage opportunities across exchanges is phenomenal. I can see exactly where my profits come from.
landing.testimonial15: [FA] Best decision I made this year. The AI finds profitable price gaps I'd never notice manually. Passive income at its finest!
landing.profitabilityDisclaimer: [FA] These are estimated returns based on historical data. Actual results may vary. Past performance does not guarantee future results. Trading involves risk of loss.
landing.faqSubtitle: [FA] Find answers to common questions about BlockMind
landing.faq1Question: [FA] What is BlockMind and how does it work?
landing.faq1Answer: [FA] BlockMind is an AI-powered automated arbitrage platform that uses advanced machine learning algorithms to find price differences across cryptocurrency exchanges and execute profitable arbitrage trades automatically. Our network of specialized bots works 24/7 to identify price gaps across 50+ exchanges.
landing.faq2Question: [FA] What is the minimum investment required?
landing.faq2Answer: [FA] The minimum investment to start arbitrage trading with BlockMind is $50. However, we recommend starting with at least $200-300 to take full advantage of our AI arbitrage algorithms across multiple exchanges.
landing.faq3Question: [FA] Is my money safe with BlockMind?
landing.faq3Answer: [FA] Yes. We use bank-grade security measures including 2FA, end-to-end encryption, and secure API connections. Your funds remain in your own exchange accounts - we never hold your money directly.
landing.faq4Question: [FA] How much profit can I expect?
landing.faq4Answer: [FA] Profits depend on the number of arbitrage opportunities available and your investment amount. Our users typically see daily returns ranging from 0.5% to 3% from price differences across exchanges. Arbitrage is generally lower risk than traditional trading since profits are locked in instantly.
landing.faq5Answer: [FA] No trading or arbitrage experience is required. BlockMind's AI handles all arbitrage operations automatically - finding price differences and executing trades across exchanges. Simply connect your accounts and let our bots do the work.
landing.faq6Question: [FA] Can I withdraw my profits anytime?
landing.faq6Answer: [FA] Yes, you can withdraw your profits at any time. Withdrawal requests are typically processed within 24-48 hours depending on the cryptocurrency and network congestion.
landing.faq7Answer: [FA] We currently support 15+ major exchanges including Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, KuCoin, and more. We're constantly adding support for new exchanges based on user demand.
landing.faq8Answer: [FA] BlockMind charges a monthly subscription fee of $250 to access all arbitrage bots. There are no hidden fees, and we don't take a percentage of your profits. You only pay for the software access.
landing.analystBotsDescription: [FA] Advanced bots that scan and analyze market conditions in real-time
landing.momentumScannerDesc: [FA] Identifies price differences across exchanges in real-time for instant arbitrage
landing.volatilityAnalyzerDesc: [FA] Monitors exchange price spreads to find the most profitable arbitrage opportunities
landing.liquidityHunterDesc: [FA] Detects high-liquidity pairs across exchanges for optimal arbitrage execution
landing.signalBotsDescription: [FA] Bots that track market signals and sentiment indicators
landing.whaleTrackerDesc: [FA] Monitors large transactions that may create temporary price imbalances across exchanges
landing.patternRecognizerDesc: [FA] Identifies recurring arbitrage patterns and optimal exchange pairs
landing.newsSentimentDesc: [FA] Analyzes events that may cause price discrepancies across exchanges
landing.aiCoreBotsDescription: [FA] Core AI bots that make trading decisions and manage risk
landing.neuralExecutorDesc: [FA] Executes simultaneous buy/sell orders across exchanges with millisecond precision
landing.riskManagerDesc: [FA] Manages arbitrage risk by calculating optimal trade sizes and exchange fees
landing.portfolioBalancerDesc: [FA] Automatically distributes funds across exchanges for maximum arbitrage coverage
landing.dataCollectionDesc: [FA] Bots gather real-time prices from 50+ exchanges simultaneously
landing.aiAnalysisDesc: [FA] Machine learning models identify profitable price differences across exchanges
landing.decisionMakingDesc: [FA] Core AI bots calculate arbitrage profit potential minus fees
landing.executionDesc: [FA] Buy and sell orders executed simultaneously across exchanges in milliseconds
landing.whyChooseSubtitle: [FA] Discover the advantages that make BlockMind the #1 choice for automated trading
landing.automationDesc: [FA] Set it and forget it. Our AI arbitrage bots scan 50+ exchanges around the clock finding profitable price differences.
landing.securityDesc: [FA] Your funds and data are protected with military-grade encryption and multi-factor authentication.
landing.analyticsDesc: [FA] Monitor your portfolio performance with live dashboards and detailed trading insights.
landing.profitabilityDesc: [FA] Earn from price differences across exchanges with low-risk arbitrage strategies.
landing.multiExchangeDesc: [FA] Scan 50+ major exchanges simultaneously to find and exploit price differences instantly.
landing.easyToUseDesc: [FA] Get started in 2 minutes with our intuitive interface designed for everyone.
landing.connectToMajor: [FA] Connect to major cryptocurrency exchanges and trade seamlessly
landing.andManyMore: [FA] And many more exchanges coming soon!
landing.ctaTitle: [FA] Start Crypto Arbitrage with AI Today
landing.ctaSubtitle: [FA] Join thousands of successful traders who are already making profits from price differences with BlockMind's automated AI arbitrage platform.

copyTrading.title: Copy Trading
